text.section:
Sec. 2-4. Same—Not effective until filed.
No rule or regulation adopted on or after July 1, 1958, shall take effect or be enforceable, except as herein provided, until fifteen (15) days after the filing thereof as required by. No rule or regulation adopted before July 1, 1958, shall be effective or enforceable after July 1, 1958, until it shall be filed with the Clerk of the Circuit Court as Clerk of the County Commission.
